items.value: A  C U R A  D O  M A L : C O N T R A  O  T E M P O
A Cura do Mal: Contra o tempo

A cura do mal is a thriller that tells the story of a brilliant biological engineer, Lucas Moyses. Summoned by the government to work on a remote island, Lucas discovers that the researches in the complex goes beyond the promise of a cure for mental illness. Lucas needs to escape the bizarre mutations before it's too late.
